headers.list-id: General Red Hat Linux discussion list <redhat-list.redhat.com>

body.para: On Sun, 12 Oct 2003, Kevin MacNeil wrote:

quote.quotepara: It looks like the storm of swen viruses is finally dying. At least on this end - I haven't received one since October 8, and for a while there I was getting hundreds a day.
Fairly early on I added clamav to my mailscanner+spamassassin+razor2 setup and shunted all the viruses to their own mailbox, so hopefully I will have some protection when the next great plague hits.
However it still bothers me that I have to spend so many cycles to process the mail. Stupid spammers, stupid Microsoft.

body.para: I've had them start using the domain I own to as the source of their spam. I suddenly started seeing all their bounce messages. I ended up shutting the domain down.
"The lyfe so short, the craft so long to learne" Chaucer
